##Usage
This script was created to clean and summarise the data set found at "https://d396qusza40orc.cloudfront.net/getdata%2Fprojectfiles%2FUCI%20HAR%20Dataset.zip"

The only pre-requirements are to download the data set from the above address and to unzip it
to your current working directory

##functionality
This script will:

* Read the required data into R
* Combine the test and training datasets
* Correctly label ID and Measurement variables
* Summarise the data to each variable's Mean
* Save the results in a new file called cleanData.csv
